**Example 1: 创建金融大模型审校任务：送审文本示例**



Input: 

```
tccli tms CreateFinancialLLMTask --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --BizType finance \
    --ContentType 2 \
    --Content 
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "de73c404-936f-4ec4-bbfe-e262d79c01e7",
        "TaskId": "3570106e-b156-45d9-8af5-99b46f7eb2f9"
    }
}
```
